website_summaries.verdict: A stylish freestanding tub at an inexpensive price point.
pros: Made of durable acrylic that wipes clean easily and resists stains and scratches
cons: Some owners gripe about the tub arriving with damage

customer_reviews.title: Excellent freestanding tub and incredible customer service!
customer_reviews.text: This tub is if great quality and very easy to install. We looked at several tubs and this one is the same quality for 1/3 the price you will find at Ferguson’s or any of the box stores. Their customer service is incredible. I accidentally broke the bottom drain flange and Woodbridge sent me a replacement part at no cost. Unbelievable customer service! I would strongly recommend any Woodbridge products.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome produce at even better price!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This bathtub is far and above what I expected in quality and ease of installation. I was very apprehensive to purchase a bathtub from Amazon but after reading reviews and pricing local stores for this type of tub I decided to try it. I was pleasantly surprised!!!!! I would highly recommend this tub to anyone who is in the market for a great produce at a great price. We added spray foam insulation to the inside walls of this tub to insulate it and keep the water warm longer, it worked great!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Fred

customer_reviews.title: Very nice and retains heat!
customer_reviews.text: When I read that it holds the heat, I was a skeptic, it really does!!! The heat outlasts me haha. We got the long 67 inch one and my husband can relax, all 6’3” of him!
customer_reviews.author: Sharee Kirk

customer_reviews.title: Quality tub!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality tub for the price. Looks and performs like a much more expensive tub. I did not use the included drain hose as it wasn't the most efficient at draining the water. I would recommend this to buyers looking for a quality tub on a budget.
customer_reviews.author: Kenny K

customer_reviews.title: Looks amazing.
customer_reviews.text: Great bathtub. Easy to install, spacious and looks beautiful in my master bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: I installed this about a month ago. Very easy installation and it’s a very comfortable tub. It also looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Meyer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I love this tub! My one complaint is I’m short and I keep sliding. (Bought to fit my husband)I bought a non slip bath mat for me. Momma is happy! Our contractor installed it and he had no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: rbowers8829

customer_reviews.title: Product quality is good and the company is responsive
customer_reviews.text: The tub was originally delivered without the faucet but customer service was very responsive and quickly shipped the missing part. The product is good quality.
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable tub, cheap made fittings
customer_reviews.text: Great tub. Need a step stool to stand on getting out of it. Installation was ok to do. However, the fittings that came with tub broke and caused leaks underneath. I recommend buying higher grade fittings and use those. Do not use theirs.
customer_reviews.author: Amber S

customer_reviews.title: Very elegant
customer_reviews.text: The tub is simply elegant. The drain is unorthodox in that it includes an above the floor trap using a flexible plastic that is a piece of inch and a half tube with a connecter piece that permits it to fill a 2 inch drain pipe.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Tub is beautiful! The faucet was missing but the company quickly resolved the issue. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Natalie masciocchi

customer_reviews.title: Perfect tub, flawless delivery service
customer_reviews.text: Incredible value and very attractive tub. Delivery service was professional and flawless. I was very worried that any issues with this would delay my whole remodel, but the tub came early and was perfect. No one can believe how little I paid for it.
customer_reviews.author: Boulder Hiker

customer_reviews.title: Tub came broken!
customer_reviews.text: My tub came cracked and broken and no one has gotten back to me about how to replace it!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Matt Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Did not recieve full order
customer_reviews.text: Only received 1 of the 2 ordered need to speak with representative to get second tub
customer_reviews.author: David Allinder

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the 67”. Great tub for the money! Large to fit two adult people. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin

customer_reviews.title: Broken and can not replace other one!
customer_reviews.text: Come on time, but is broken, even can not replace it, not understand!
customer_reviews.author: vicky Ansetti

product_meta.title: WOODBRIDGE white Acrylic Freestanding Bathtub Contemporary Soaking Tub Overflow and Drain, 67" B-0013 Brushed Nickel
product_meta.description:
Color:67" B-0013 Brushed NickelColor:67" B-0013 WHITE

AAA Quality Freestanding Bathtub With Brushed Nickel Overflow & Drain

Designed for elegance and sophistication, the WOODBRIDGE freestanding bathtub is modern and made for relaxation. Smooth curves molded to comfortably fit your body, letting all the day's stress melt away.

SPECIFICATION

Exterior Size: 67" L x 31 1/2" W x 22 4/5" H; Capacity: 60 Gallons; Max water depth (to overflow): 14 1/2"
Full fiberglass construction with acrylic topcoat for high durability and shine
Double Walled Design. Formed with two layers of acrylic, bringing maximum insulation and keeping water at its desired temperature longer while soaking
Wide, deep tub with a gentle slope that offers a more comfortable, leisurely soak. Big enough for a man, yet gracefully designed for a woman
Brushed Nickel Integrated Overflow & Push Pop-up Drain included; 
Drain Location: Center
Bonus: 
Large freestanding soaking bathtub for full body immersion
Hidden adjustable legs for perfect leveling 
Glossy finish is resistant to dulling, scratching, and fading
Certification: UPC & CSA Certified . Meet or exceed ANSI Z124.1 & ANSI A112-19.7
Warranty: 5 years limited Warranty on the bathtub surface and structural. 1 year limited warranty on the plumbing parts 
Package: Thick carton Box with shrink wrapped on wooden pallet

About WOODBRIDGE:

WOODBRIDGE specializes in selling high quality kitchen and bathroom products since 2005 . We are committed to providing each customer with the highest standard of customer service and best value products. Please don't hesitate to contact us if you have any questions or concerns. Customer Service Phone: 562-229-0088.
feature_bullets: ✅ [ DIMENSIONS AND SPECIFICATIONS]: Exterior Dimension: 67" Long x 31 1/2" Wide x 22 4/5" Deep – Effective Tub Capacity: 60 Gallons

✅ [PREMIUM QUALITY CONSTRUCTION ]: Woodbridge bathtub is made out of 100% high gloss white LUCITE acrylic and reinforced with ASHLAND resin & fiberglass . All of these are top quality material which are rarely used by others due to a relatively high cost.

✅ [DESIGN INSPIRATION]: Woodbridge bathtub is luxury, comfort and chic style. Its size is ample yet economical allowing it to fit a variety of spaces. Gently sloping lines follow the natural curves of your body providing exceptional comfort.
✅ [ENDURACLEAN]: Easy clean, easy maintenance, stain-resistant, scratch resistant surface that maintains its high gloss. Can be use for a long time. And keep bright and clean as new.

✅ [ DURABLE]: Acrylic and reinforced with fiberglass for long lasting durability. Bottom with stainless steel bracket makes the bearing capacity is up to 1000 LBS , Double Walled reinforce design bringing maximum insulation and keeping water at its desired temperature longer and suitable for 1 Or 2 persons bathing.

✅ [ TOP QUALITY DRAIN & PIPE ] Woodbridge bathtub includes anti-leak design drain & pipe system which is tough & durable , Anti -odor , easy to install. Total pipe length 37". With Woodbridge bathtub, NO cheap drain /hose, NO leak trouble.

✅ [PACKAGE INCLUDED]: Assembled solid brass brushed nickel drain, stainless steel brushed nickel overflow, user & instruction manual. Besides, extremely solid package - very firm carton box is used to transport bathtubs, making sure a safe delivery.
Included Components: Bathtub + Anti Leak Drain & Pipe

✅ [CERTIFICATION & WARANTY]: US & Canada UPC & CSA certified products. 5 years limited Waranty on the bathtub surface and structural. 1 year limited waranty on the plumbing parts , WOODBRIDGE US based product support team is happy to assist with any sales or product-oriented queries.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars57 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
